name: Pong by Dennis
description:
This is my attempt to make a pong game. This was made in 3D so the paddles, ball, and the stage will have some depth to them.

Player one - 

W - move up

S - move down

Player Two - 

Up Arrow - move up

Down Arrow - move down

General - 

Esc - pause

R - reset

Thanks for playing ( or at least checking out the page).
